Topic.Title: I was circle jerked by Dell

Message.Msg: Hello gin.haruko, I am from Dell Social Media and Community. I am sorry for the inconvenience and the delay caused. Please provide me the order number and the name on a private message. I will be glad to get your order processed. If you need any further assistance, feel free to message me on Twitter. I will be happy to assist. Dell-Niranjan Twitter: @NiranjanatDell

Topic.Title: I was circle jerked by Dell

Message.Msg: Hello sallykohles, I am from Dell Social Media and Community. Please accept my sincere apologies for the delay caused. It could be really upsetting to anyone if they had to spend hours on the phone to get an order processed. I would request you to private message me your order number and name. I will be happy to escallate this and have your order processed ASAP. If you need any further assistance, feel free to message me on Twitter. I will be happy to assist. Dell-Niranjan Twitter: @NiranjanatDell
